title: How to Draw a Dog Face

steps.title: Draw a circular shape and two floppy ears.
steps.content: Draw a circular shape and two floppy ears. Add also a vertical and horizontal line on the circular shape to serve as your guidelines. Make sure to use them as they will really help.

steps.title: Draw the dog's nose.
steps.content: Draw the dog's nose. Draw an upside down heart and a triangular shape with two cutout holes.

steps.title: Draw the dog's eyes.
steps.content: Draw the dog's eyes. Remember to make the eyes as glossy as possible by drawing squiggly lines within his pupils.

steps.title: Draw small details such as the little circles on his nose and then lines for his eyelids and ears.
steps.content: Draw small details such as the little circles on his nose and then lines for his eyelids and ears.

steps.title: Draw his paws with a series of four rounded triangular shapes on the left and to the right side of his face.
steps.content: Draw his paws with a series of four rounded triangular shapes on the left and to the right side of his face.

steps.title: Draw the details of his paws and arms.
steps.content: Draw the details of his paws and arms.

steps.title: Outline your drawing.
steps.content: Outline your drawing. Use a black pen or marker to ink over your penciled sketch. After outlining your drawing, clean it up by erasing your penciled sketch and guidelines.

steps.title: Color him with colors such as gray, dark gray, black or brown.
steps.content: Color him with colors such as gray, dark gray, black or brown.

steps.title: Make a small stick figure in the center of your drawing area.
steps.content: Make a small stick figure in the center of your drawing area. Add small legs but no arms.

steps.title: Create three dots on each side of the stick figure.
steps.content: Create three dots on each side of the stick figure.

steps.title: Draw a circle around the stick figure.
steps.content: Draw a circle around the stick figure. Make sure none of the stick's body parts or dots touch the circle.

steps.title: Create two half circles attached to the top of the main circle.
steps.content: Create two half circles attached to the top of the main circle. These should be almost touching each other but not quite. They will be the eyes.

steps.title: Draw a semi-circle around the eyes.
steps.content: Draw a semi-circle around the eyes. This will be the rest of the face.

steps.title: Add two small dots in the center of the eyes for pupils.
steps.content: Add two small dots in the center of the eyes for pupils.

steps.title: Draw some ears.
steps.content: Draw some ears. They can be floppy, pointy, however you want them!

steps.title: Don't forget the tongue, and the bow!
steps.content: Don't forget the tongue, and the bow!
